ref: 11201 vacā f. ʻ a kind of aromatic root (Acorus calamus?) ʼ Hcar.
Pa. vaca -- , vacattha -- n. ʻ a kind of root ʼ;
Pk. vacā -- , vayā -- f. ʻ a kind of plant ʼ;
K. way f. ʻ the sweet -- flag Acorus calamus and its root (used as a stomachic and for diminishing phlegm) ʼ;
Si. vada ʻ the shoe -- flower Hibiscus rosea sinensis ʼ, vadakaha ʻ Acorus calamus, orris root ʼ.
